title: Search & Compare!
text: ### Search the world’s best celebrity and elite trainers.   Compare over 1000 plans to find the perfect one  for your lifestyle! Programs may include fitness, nutrition, mindfulness, motivation. Filter and select exactly what you need. Start today!

title: Try a free week!
text: ### Jump in, give it a go for a week risk free!  Once you’ve selected your fave plan, sign up for a taster  and kick butt! You’re not alone, our Collective Body team is right behind you.  We’ll check-in each month to keep you on track!

title: Workout anytime, anywhere!
text: ### All  programs are designed to be done anytime, anywhere so you can fit health and fitness  into your schedule, on your terms! Stream to your TV, phone, ipad or any device. Just press play
